Text.val: -- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Convert input parameters to proper pictures
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
... use GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE if PI.DATE is empty

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_AINITIALC, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_DUEDATE from :1/DEBH, :1/INVO where DEBH_REVERSEFACTORING = 'Y' and INVO_DEBH_NO = DEBH_NO and exists (select * from :1/INUD where INUD_INVO_NO = INVO_NO and (INUD_DATEFROM <= ':2' and ':2' <= INUD_DATEUNTIL or INUD_DATEFROM <= ':3' and ':3' <= INUD_DATEUNTIL)) and not(exists (select * from :1/REPA where REPA_ADMNNO = INVO_ADMNO and REPA_DEBH = INVO_DEBH_NO and REPA_RPRT_TYPE = 'UPR' and REPA_DATE = ':3' and REPA_DUNNINGLETTERCODE = INVO_CURRENCY)) order by INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_INVOICENO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- Build final XML File per group
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
( '###' uses as separator, because we have only one argument for the FTP address
in BXA900 the three diff. values will be wrapped)
-- Calculate totals for BXA302E Footer record

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select cast(sum(days(INUD_DATEUNTIL) - days(INUD_DATEFROM) +1) as decimal(4,0)) from :1/INUD where INUD_INVO_NO = :2 and INUD_STORNO_BY_INUD_NO = 0 and INUD_STORNO_FROM_INUD_NO = 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(INUD_INTERESTPERCENTAGE * (days(INUD_DATEUNTIL) - days(INUD_DATEFROM) +1)) / sum(days(INUD_DATEUNTIL) - days(INUD_DATEFROM) +1) as decimal (6,4)) from :1/INUD where INUD_INVO_NO = :2 and INUD_STORNO_BY_INUD_NO = 0 and INUD_STORNO_FROM_INUD_NO = 0 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INUD_INTERESTAMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INUD where INUD_INVO_NO = :2 for fetch only

select cast(sum(INUD_INTERESTPERCENTAGE * (days(INUD_DATEUNTIL) - days(INUD_DATEFROM) +1)) / sum(days(INUD_DATEUNTIL) - days(INUD_DATEFROM) +1) as decimal (6,4)) from :1/INUD where INUD_INVO_NO = :2 and INUD_STORNO_BY_INUD_NO = 0 and INUD_STORNO_FROM_INUD_NO = 0 and INUD_DATEBOOKING between ':3' and ':4' for fetch only
